description: Retry focused follow-up with clean runs: wake detection verification and project-root file discovery.

experiments.title: Wake detection then cancel
experiments.prompt: Please do this in order: (1) start one long-running exec task (for example sleep 90), (2) wait at least 40 seconds, (3) query runtime state from the local API and check whether task_health or wake signals reference that task id, (4) cancel that task, and (5) report the task id, whether wake/signal detection was observed, and final status.

experiments.title: Project-root largest Go files
experiments.prompt: Please inspect the local project at /app/go-agents and list the five largest Go source files by line count, with exact file paths and counts.
